name: GEO (itch)
description:
Phew, I barely made it!

This little experiment is my entry for A Game By Its Cover 2018

It was inspired by Emily Haasch's entry for 'My Famicase Exhibition'

Check that out here: http://famicase.com/17/softs/012.html

How to play

Use your gorgeous, beautiful arrow keys.

Credits

Music is The Empire, by t4ngr4m

Sound created by me using BFXR

Character sprites are (mostly) my edits of this asset pack by GrafxKid

Levels created in Matt Thorson's OGMO

Code written by me from scratch using HaxeFlixel
